title: Atlanta Hip-Hop Culture Tour
shortDescription: Dive into the rich history and vibrant hip-hop scene of Atlanta with this exciting scavenger hunt!
fullDescription: Explore the key landmarks, studios, and murals that celebrate Atlanta's role as the epicenter of hip-hop culture. This hunt is perfect for music lovers and anyone looking to connect with the city's cultural roots!

missions.title: Trap Music Museum
missions.shortDescription: Start your journey at the Trap Music Museum, dedicated to Atlanta's iconic hip-hop subgenre.
missions.hint: Look for a museum filled with immersive exhibits and tributes to trap legends.

missions.title: Castleberry Hill Murals
missions.shortDescription: Discover the hip-hop-inspired street art in the Castleberry Hill district.
missions.hint: Look for colorful murals featuring tributes to Atlanta's music icons.

missions.title: Stankonia Studios
missions.shortDescription: Visit the legendary Stankonia Studios, home to OutKast and countless Atlanta hits.
missions.hint: Look for the studio that helped shape the Southern hip-hop sound.

missions.title: ATL Mural - 'Welcome to Atlanta'
missions.shortDescription: Stop by the iconic 'Welcome to Atlanta' mural that honors the city's hip-hop legacy.
missions.hint: Look for the massive mural near the Edgewood Avenue district.

missions.title: Magic City
missions.shortDescription: End your tour at Magic City, a cultural landmark that shaped Atlantaâ€™s hip-hop scene.
missions.hint: Known for its connection to hip-hop music videos and legendary performances.
